snippet.title: Galaxy Pass Station: Official Release Trailer | Colony Simulator Game on Steam | Save Humanity 2023
snippet.description:
Get ready to take your seat as the commander of an advanced space colony in the highly-anticipated PC game, Galaxy Pass Station! Launching exclusively on Steam, this is your chance to build, strategize, and safeguard the future of humanity. Inspired by classics like Papers, Please, Sim Tower, Fallout Shelter, Oxygen Not Included, and The Sims, Galaxy Pass Station adds a unique twist with life-or-death decisions and extraterrestrial encounters.

👾 Key Features:

- Advanced Colony Management: Master the essentials of resource gathering, civilian management, and infrastructure development.
- Extraterrestrial Diplomacy: Negotiate or battle with alien races who may aid or hinder your mission.
- Lifesaving Decisions: The fate of humanity rests in your hands. Make the right calls and become a galactic hero.

👉 Download Galaxy Pass Station on Steam TODAY!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1571990/Galaxy_Pass_Station/?utm_source=youtube_release

#GalaxyPassStation #GalaxyPass
